items.sentence: When Tom didn\'t come to work on Monday, we all started to get worried.
Tom doesn\'t have the courage to ask Mary to lend him her video camera.
Tom and Mary said that they didn\'t care whether we helped them or not.
Keep a close eye on Tom and make sure he doesn\'t get into any trouble.
Tom coaxed the mouse out of the hole in the wall with a piece of bread.
I\'ve never been to Australia, but my father\'s been there three times.
Tom wore gloves to avoid leaving his fingerprints on the murder weapon.
We all got together and bought Tom a gift certificate for his birthday.
An old man walking with a cane asked Tom to help him across the street.
Tom seemed genuinely surprised when I told him that Mary had left town.
